content:
I do not have personal preferences or experiences. however, here are a few other essential oils that are good for respiratory issues:

1. tea tree oil: it has natural antibacterial, antiviral, and anti-inflammatory properties that can help relieve congestion, coughs, and sore throats. 2. rosemary oil: it has expectorant properties that can help clear mucus from the respiratory tract and relieve chest tightness and coughs. 3. lavender oil: it has anti-inflammatory properties that can help reduce inflammation in the respiratory tract and relieve sinus congestion. 4. lemon oil: it has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties that can help reduce respiratory inflammation, relieve coughs, and clear mucus. remember to always do a patch test before applying essential oils topically and consult with a healthcare professional before using essential oils for any health condition.
